cova.core

Class SMTSolverZ3

  • java.lang.Object
    • cova.core.SMTSolverZ3

  • public class SMTSolverZ3
extends Object
    The Class SMTSolverZ3 creates Z3 boolean expression and solves boolean constraints.

      • reset

      • solve

        public com.microsoft.z3.BoolExpr solve(com.microsoft.z3.BoolExpr op1,
                                       com.microsoft.z3.BoolExpr op2,
                                       Operator op,
                                       boolean simplify)
        This function solves the boolean formula (op1 op op2) using the "ctx-solver-simplify" tactic of Z3 and returns the result in CNF(Conjunctive Normal Form). So far it only supports AND and OR operators.
        Parameters:
        op1 - the first operand
        op2 - the second operand (optional )
        op - the operator
        simplify - true if the constraint should be simplified.
        Returns:
        the simplified CNF by applying the operator op to op1 and op2.

      • prove

        public boolean prove(com.microsoft.z3.BoolExpr expr1,
                     com.microsoft.z3.BoolExpr expr2)
        This function proves if the given two boolean expressions are equivalent.
        Parameters:
        expr1 - the first expression
        expr2 - the second expression
        Returns:
        true, if expr1 and expr2 are equivalent.

        Negate the given expression.
        Parameters:

        simplify - true if the constraint should be simplified.
        Returns:
